Question:
Everyone on the block was logged in to help with this year's community rummage sale. The first people who appeared were an older adult and a high schooler. The older adult went before most of the other people arrived there, and this was the third year in a row that had happened! I found out later that a friend signed them and they never really do any work. Fortunately, the other person who came early was always very helpful and working really hard so they were able to get a lot of the event set up. Who is a hardworking person?
